organizations: Liquid Fuel Control Valve Print Email Company Details
title: ALV 10 Liquid Fuel Control Valve
text:
Print Email Company Details 
The ALV10 is an intelligent electronic liquid fuel valve designed to meet the needs of all gas turbine applications. Its speed and stability allow it to be used for either power generation or mechanical drive applications that range in size from250KW to 35MW. 
The ALV 10 is a unique design with an on-board computer and internal flowmeter. The valve will meter diesel, kerosene or other similar liquid fuels to a gas turbine engine. It is a closed loop servo valve. 
For more information please download. Available Downloads
